title: Lutherus Theosdotos
creator: Simonius, Joannes
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Simonius, Joannes: Lutherus Theosdotos  Oratio, Mendaciis Papisto-Turcici cuiusdam Iesuitae, originem doctrinae coelestis ... & doctor divinitus excitatus fuit Martinus Lutherus, Diabolo blaspheme ascribentis, opposita, & iterato edita. Rostochii  Berlin
publisher: Reusnerus  Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin – Preußischer Kulturbesitz, Germany
alternative: Oratio, Mendaciis Papisto-Turcici cuiusdam Iesuitae, originem doctrinae coelestis ... & doctor divinitus excitatus fuit Martinus Lutherus, Diabolo blaspheme ascribentis, opposita, & iterato edita
